title: Integrate Amazon ECS and Amazon EFS
description: Terraform IaC template to provision Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) resources to integrate with Amazon Elastic File System (EFS).

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern will provision Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) resources including cluster and task definition along with Amazon Elastic File System (EFS) for a persistent file storage.
This pattern will also create a container with a example bash script to access the EFS file system during runtime which will be stored in Amazon Elastic Container Repository (ECR).

bullets.text: Using Amazon EFS file systems with Amazon ECS

text: See the README in the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
